t: How to get brand approval on Amazon - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 3): Go to Seller Central Follow the below steps 1. click the Inventory link and select “Add a Product” 2. Run a search for the item you wish to sell 3. In the search results, click the “Listing limitations apply” link next to the product 4. Click the “Request Approval” ...

t: Requirements and tips for enrolling a brand in Amazon Brand Registry - Sell on Amazon
s: June 4, 2024 - Hoping to build your brand with Amazon? Start the process by enrolling it in Amazon Brand Registry, a free program that unlocks your eligibility to access a suite of brand-building tools and protection benefits.

t: Amazon Restricted and Gated Brands: Your Questions Answered – Webretailer.com
s: There isn’t an open application process for brand gating. You need to contact Seller Support and ask for your brand to be gated. It can take 8 or more weeks to get approval, and there is no guarantee that Amazon will agree to your request or that they will gate all of your brand’s ASINs.

t: Amazon tests tool that lets some brands contact shoppers
s: April 23, 2021 - Amazon is piloting a tool that lets brands communicate directly with shoppers, in a departure from its historically tight control of customer data.

t: Amazon Brand Registry: Protect and Build Your Brand in the UK
